Adding global request id generator and tests.

Process location requests as soon as a new one arrives

Fixes #56

Fixes #62
Update framework version
Update pod spec to v4.1.0
Fix preprocessor check

Support background location updates in iOS 9

iOS 9 requires setting allowsBackgroundLocationUpdates to YES in order to receive background location updates. We only set it to YES if the location background mode is enabled for this app, as the documentation suggests it is a fatal programmer error otherwise. Additionally enabled the location background mode for the example app.
Ensure subscriptions don't get canceled for intermittent errors

work properly.

ode-in-ios.

- Declare a type for the location request (INTULocationRequestType).
- Check whether the location request is a subscription using of its type instead of the desired accuracy.
